Key Match Events: The Rangers walked off with a 7-4 win over the Yankees
Clay Holmes blew his 11th save of the season
Wyatt Langford hit a game-winning, walk-off grand slam
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone deflected questions about a potential bullpen change
Clay Holmes expressed disappointment with his performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees dropped into second place in the AL East
This was the fifth loss in the last seven games for the Yankees
Others: Carlos Rodon struck out a season-high 11 batters in six innings
The Yankees took a 4-1 lead into the bottom of the eighth
